answers.answer: Antibodies may fluctuate but no, there is no "cure" for getting rid of them. There is medical literature out there that state that Selenium has been shown to reduce TPO antibodies. That said, there is new literature out there that is suggesting that Selenium may be tied into diabetes.

That means I'll always have to take Synthyroid. How are these antibodies produced in the body. Is there any Yoga or physical exercise that can help thyroid gland function properly and help get rid of antibodies.

That is correct, that you will have to take medication for life. As for Yoga  etc. it certainly would not hurt you and you may find it (or whatever you choose) will give you a mental boost as well.I am not aware of any "magic bullet" for reducing antibodies. Selenium is the only thing I have heard of that is thought to reduce TPO. Anything that we do to try to improve our life/health is a good thing.
